deviceConnector.name: Actility Connector
deviceConnector.description: Automatically generated by integration (Swisscom LPN Test)

deviceType.name: Ranos dB 2
deviceType.description: Sound sensor powered by a solar panel. Measures dynamic range of 33 - 121dB and a DSP sample rate of 48 kHz. The use of GPS can be set in the DSS Connect App for geolocation and synchronizing the internal clock.
